xwikidoc.content: administration.templateProvider.description=Opis ### Missing: administration.templateProvider.description.hint=The information to be displayed for template provider when a new page is created. administration.templateProvider.icon=Ikona ### Missing: administration.templateProvider.icon.hint=The icon to be displayed for template provider when a new page is created. Select one from the {0}full list of icons{1}. administration.templateProvider.creationRestrictions=Ustaw ograniczenia ### Missing: administration.templateProvider.creationRestrictions.hint=The list of locations (including their children) where this template is allowed to create pages administration.templateProvider.creationRestrictions.none=Ten szablon można używać wszędzie ### Missing: administration.templateProvider.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions=Creation Restrictions as Suggestions ### Missing: administration.templateProvider.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.hint=Allows the user to select any location to create the page with this template, using the first creation restriction as the prefilled default location when the template is selected from the list.
